snippet.title: Tiny Klepto - Official teaser
snippet.description:
Break into houses, pick lock doors, hack alarms, and steal everything you can! Unlock new neighborhoods, upgrade your tools and make all your way up to the treasures of the History Museum. Can you steal the legendary ruby before you run out of time?

DOWNLOAD it now for FREE in Google Play!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tinystudio.tinyklepto

Official Website:
http://www.josemariaolea.com/tiny-klepto
